org.lenskit.util.collections

Class TopNLong2DoubleAccumulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.util.collections.TopNLong2DoubleAccumulator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Long2DoubleAccumulator

    public final class TopNLong2DoubleAccumulator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Long2DoubleAccumulator

    Accumulate the top N scored IDs. IDs are sorted by their associated scores.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TopNLong2DoubleAccumulator(int n)
      Create a new accumulator to accumulate the top n IDs.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LongList finishList()
      Accumulate the scored items into a list.
      Long2DoubleMap finishMap()
      Accumulate the scores into a map and reset the accumulator.
      LongSet finishSet()
      Accumulate the scored items into a set.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Query whether the accumulator is empty.
      void put(long item, double score)
      Put a new item in the accumulator.
      int size()
      Get the number of items in the accumulator.

      • TopNLong2DoubleAccumulator

        public TopNLong2DoubleAccumulator(int n)

        Create a new accumulator to accumulate the top n IDs.

        Parameters:
        n - The number of IDs to retain.

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Description copied from interface: Long2DoubleAccumulator

        Query whether the accumulator is empty.

        Specified by:
        isEmpty in interface Long2DoubleAccumulator
        Returns:
        true if the accumulator has no items.

      • size

        public int size()
        Description copied from interface: Long2DoubleAccumulator

        Get the number of items in the accumulator.

        Specified by:
        size in interface Long2DoubleAccumulator
        Returns:
        The number of items accumulated so far, up to the maximum items desired from the accumulator.

      • put

        public void put(long item,
                double score)
        Description copied from interface: Long2DoubleAccumulator

        Put a new item in the accumulator. Putting the same item twice does not replace the previous entry - it adds a new entry with the same ID.

        Specified by:
        put in interface Long2DoubleAccumulator
        Parameters:
        item - The item to add to the accumulator.
        score - The item’s score.

      • finishMap

        public Long2DoubleMap finishMap()
        Description copied from interface: Long2DoubleAccumulator

        Accumulate the scores into a map and reset the accumulator.

        After this method is called, the accumulator is ready for another accumulation.

        Specified by:
        finishMap in interface Long2DoubleAccumulator
        Returns:
        A map of items.

      • finishSet

        public LongSet finishSet()
        Description copied from interface: Long2DoubleAccumulator

        Accumulate the scored items into a set.

        Specified by:
        finishSet in interface Long2DoubleAccumulator
        Returns:
        The set of items accumulated.

      • finishList

        public LongList finishList()
        Description copied from interface: Long2DoubleAccumulator

        Accumulate the scored items into a list.

        Specified by:
        finishList in interface Long2DoubleAccumulator
        Returns:
        The list of items accumulated, in decreasing order of score.
